name: LD48 - Into the Forrest
description:
You must explore deeper and deeper into the forrest to eliminate all enemies lurking in the woods so your village will be safe.  You win once all enemies have been eliminated.

Instructions

Click on the house icon in the tooltip menu to start building.  Click on a building to create units.  Use the selection area in the tooltip menu to select units and send them to fight enemies in the forrest.

Watch the 30 second tutorial.

Buildings and Units Barracks

Barracks spawn melee units.

ImageNameAboutScoutScouts are fast and weak.  They have the shorted spawn time of all units.SquireSquires are stronger and slower than scouts.  They take slightly more time to spawn than scouts do.KnightKnights are the strongest and slowest units.  They also take the most time to spawn. Archery Range

Archery ranges spawn ranged units.

ImageNameAboutArcherArchers are ranged units that fire arrows at other units.CrossbowCrossbows are ranged units that fire bolts that do more damage than arrows.  Crossbows also fire more slowly compared to archers. Archery Tower

Archery towers are ranged defensive buildings that fire arrows at enemy units.

Walls and Gates

Walls and gates add fortifications to your base.

Credits

A special thank you to the artists who selflessly provide their art for others to use.  More than anything I am very happy with the art and soundtrack for this game.  I wish I could take credit for it but I can't.  Here are some people who can.
